title: Template engines
content: It has been fun learning about Handlebars and creating a full stack web application with it.

title: Why MVC is so important
content: MVC allows developers to maintain a true separation of concerns, devising their code between the Model layer for data, the View layer for design, and the Controller layer for application logic.

title: Authentication vs. Authorisation
content: There is a difference between authenticaton and authorisation. Authentication means confirming your own identity, whereas authorisation means being allowed access to the system.
